page.title: 03THORNHILL OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school lies beside the Kippen road in Lowtown. It has fifty two pupils and three teachers; Mrs McAree, Mrs MacGregor and Mrs Stevenson. We also have visiting teachers for music, P.E., art, sewing and a remedial teacher who works with children who need special help. We use the swing park opposite for football and have netball in the playground. There is quite a busy road road to cross and the headteacher always supervises our crossing. We are at school for six and a half hours, from 9 am. to 3.30pm. Our main subjects are English, Mathematics, Arithmetic and Environmental Studies (History, Science and Geography). There is a Health Visitor who comes to see our general health. We also have visits from the Dentist, Chiropidist and Audio-Visual specialists.
